task.title: How to subtract numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to subtract numbers using the subtraction function.

taskbody.context:
.
To successfully subtarct numbers, you must know about subtraction

result.p: The result from the substarction is displayed.

taskbody.example:
You want to subtract 2 from 3. The equation will look like: 3-2=1. You enter 3. Press minus. Enter 2. Press equals.
The result 1 appears on the screen.
